effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user bites the target with flame-cloaked fangs to deal damage. This may also leave the target with a burn.
